context: Evaluates correct usage of the agent-skills Confluence skill's CQL search functionality. The solution must call search_content or the equivalent CLI search subcommand and correctly display the filtered results with appropriate metadata.

checklist.name: search_content called
checklist.description: The solution calls search_content with the cql parameter, or invokes confluence.py with the 'search' subcommand and CQL query string

checklist.name: Results include metadata
checklist.description: Each result item in the output includes at least the page title and space key, as extracted from the search response and formatted by the output layer

checklist.name: Type filter applied
checklist.description: When a content type filter is specified (e.g. page or blogpost), it is passed as the content_type argument to search_content, which appends it to the CQL query

checklist.name: Space filter applied
checklist.description: When a space key filter is specified, it is passed as the space argument to search_content and constrains results to that space
